section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform 1.0.4 Released
section.p: Feb 1st 2009- DataNucleus Access Platform 1.0.4 ("Faraday") is released. DataNucleus Access Platform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, db4o, LDAP, XML, and Excel. It continues from the Java Persistent Objects (JPOX) project. Version 1.0.4 includes the following changes

ul.li: Bug fix to allow registration of persistent classes when loaded by ClassLoader

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
